EmailTemplate.name: License Renewal Due
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce Request Renewal Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Internal_Request__c.Requestor_Name__c},
Your Salesforce Request will be set to renew in 30 days, please view the invoice in the License Management tool.
Request # {!Internal_Request__c.Name}
If you have any questions please send an email to licenserequests@auspost.com.au
Regards, Customer Systems Team
